Package it.unive.dais.legodroid.lib.plugs

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractSensor
    Abstract class for sensors collecting reusable functionalities.
    GyroSensor
    Instances of this class allow operations on the gyroscope sensor (accelerometer) connected to EV3 via an input port.
    LightSensor
    Instances of this class allow operations on the light sensor connected to EV3 via an input port.
    LightSensor.Rgb
    This class represents a raw RGB color value via a triple of integers.
    Plug<Port>
    This abstract class is a base class for both input and output ports.
    TachoMotor
    This class offers methods for controlling the tacho motor of EV3 devices.
    TouchSensor
    Instances of this class allow operations on the touch (or pressure) sensor connected to EV3 via an input port.
    UltrasonicSensor
    Instances of this class allow operations on the ultrasonic sensor connected to EV3 via an input port.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    LightSensor.Color
    This enum type represents the possible colors returned by the sensor in device mode EV3-Color-RGB-Raw.
    TachoMotor.Polarity
    Polarity enumeration type.
    TachoMotor.Type
    Type of motor enumeration type.
